comment: This extended version incorporates a novel section (Section 10) that provides a comprehensive analysis of recent proposed attacks, notably "3DFed: Adaptive and extensible framework for covert backdoor attack in federated learning" by Li et al. This new section addresses flawed assertions made in the papers that aim to bypass FLAME or misinterpreted its fundamental design principles
